### mPrivateSegmentBufferSGPR {#a2db4f113806f28f6cca621c61e4544b3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint16&#95;t llvm::AMDGPU::HSAMD::Kernel::DebugProps::Metadata::mPrivateSegmentBufferSGPR = uint16&#95;t(-1)</>}>
Fixed SGPR of the first of 4 SGPRs used to hold the scratch V# used for the entire kernel execution.

Must be uint16&#95;t(-1) if mDebuggerABIVersion is not set or SGPR not used or not known. Optional.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/amdgpumetadata-h/#l00359">359</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/amdgpumetadata-h">AMDGPUMetadata.h</a>.

### mReservedFirstVGPR {#a47d9614fc020efd50f1ed592671a2a3d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint16&#95;t llvm::AMDGPU::HSAMD::Kernel::DebugProps::Metadata::mReservedFirstVGPR = uint16&#95;t(-1)</>}>
First fixed VGPR reserved.

Must be uint16&#95;t(-1) if mDebuggerABIVersion is not set or mReservedFirstVGPR is 0. Optional.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/amdgpumetadata-h/#l00355">355</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/amdgpumetadata-h">AMDGPUMetadata.h</a>.

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint16&#95;t llvm::AMDGPU::HSAMD::Kernel::DebugProps::Metadata::mReservedNumVGPRs = 0</>}>
Consecutive number of VGPRs reserved for debugger use.

Must be 0 if mDebuggerABIVersion is not set. Optional.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/amdgpumetadata-h/#l00352">352</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/amdgpumetadata-h">AMDGPUMetadata.h</a>.

### mWavefrontPrivateSegmentOffsetSGPR {#aa65418c35da7fc202e08d343ce911cd6}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint16&#95;t llvm::AMDGPU::HSAMD::Kernel::DebugProps::Metadata::mWavefrontPrivateSegmentOffsetSGPR = uint16&#95;t(-1)</>}>
Fixed SGPR used to hold the wave scratch offset for the entire kernel execution.

Must be uint16&#95;t(-1) if mDebuggerABIVersion is not set or SGPR is not used or not known. Optional.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/amdgpumetadata-h/#l00363">363</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/amdgpumetadata-h">AMDGPUMetadata.h</a>.
